statements: UPSERT INTO Inventory (id, product_name, quantity, price) VALUES (1, 'Product A', 100, 10.99)
UPSERT INTO Inventory (id, product_name, quantity, price) VALUES (2, 'Product B', 50, 20.50)
UPSERT INTO Inventory (id, product_name, quantity, price) VALUES (3, 'Product C', 75, 15.75)
UPSERT INTO products (id, name, price, quantity) VALUES (1, 'Product A', 10.99, 100) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name = 'Product A', price = 10.99, quantity = 100;
UPSERT INTO products (id, name, price, quantity) VALUES (2, 'Product B', 20.99, 50) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name = 'Product B', price = 20.99, quantity = 50;
UPSERT INTO orders (order_id, product_id, order_date, quantity) VALUES (1, 1, '2022-10-15', 5) ON CONFLICT (order_id) DO UPDATE SET product_id = 1, order_date = '2022-10-15', quantity = 5;
INSERT INTO products (name, price, stock_quantity) VALUES ('Product A', 50.00, 100) ON CONFLICT (name) DO UPDATE SET price = 50.00, stock_quantity = 100
INSERT INTO suppliers (name, contact_info) VALUES ('Supplier X', 'contact@example.com') ON CONFLICT (name) DO UPDATE SET contact_info = 'contact@example.com'

INSERT INTO orders (product_id, supplier_id, quantity, order_date) VALUES (1, 1, 50, '2022-01-01') ON CONFLICT (product_id, supplier_id, order_date) DO UPDATE SET quantity = 50, order_date = '2022-01-01'
INSERT INTO products (id, name, price, quantity) VALUES (1, 'Product A', 100.00, 50) ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET name = excluded.name, price = excluded.price, quantity = excluded.quantity;
INSERT INTO products (id, name, price, quantity) VALUES (2, 'Product B', 75.50, 30) ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET name = excluded.name, price = excluded.price, quantity = excluded.quantity;
INSERT INTO products (id, name, price, quantity) VALUES (3, 'Product C', 50.25, 20) ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET name = excluded.name, price = excluded.price, quantity = excluded.quantity;
UPSERT INTO products (product_id, product_name, quantity) VALUES (1, 'Product A', 100)
UPSERT INTO categories (category_id, category_name) VALUES (1, 'Category A')
UPSERT INTO suppliers (supplier_id, supplier_name, supplier_contact) VALUES (1, 'Supplier A', '123-456-7890')
